original_title: Sri Lankan Muslims to mark Hajj on 29th June
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Crescent of the Month of Dhul Hijjah was sighted on Monday, 19th of June 2023, and Eid Ul Adha (Hajj Festival) will be marked on the 29th of June 2023, said the Colombo Grand Mosque.
